error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Powershop website. Please check your internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. This could be due to: 1) Invalid email/password, 2) Account locked due to multiple failed attempts, 3) Account suspended. Please verify credentials or reset your password if needed.
error.account_locked: Account appears to be locked. Please use the 'Reset/Create Password' link on the Powershop website to unlock your account.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred during setup. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Powershop account is already configured
